pages.title: Rub-a-dub-dub
pages.text: Having delved into the mist further now, you may notice your skin is a bit itchy. Unfortunately, while $(item)Respirators$() protect your lungs, the $(thing)Mist$() doesn't do much for your skin either. Fortunately, a bath can solve this. Water alone will clear $(thing)Chemical Pollution$() slowly, but soap clears it much faster - so have a good scrub!
Tallow can be collected from some of the creatures of the $(thing)Misty World$(), while $(item)Saltpeter$() can be mined there.
